name: Lanternal
description:
Lanternal is a game made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 43 game jam in which the theme was "Sacrifices must be made".  In Lanternal, a fast-paced bullet hell shooter, you play the role of a young mage who needs to defeat foes and capture their souls.  At regular intervals a demon will appear requiring you to sacrifice some power in order to continue. 

Controls:

  • W = Up
  • A = Left
  • S = Down
  • D = Right
  • Mouse = Aim
  • Left Click = Fire Staff
  • Right Click = AOE Blast

Credits:

  • Will Bittner (Developer support)
  • Liz Cooper (Production/Publishing) 
  • Peet Cooper (Art/Design)
  • Pat Farnach (Programming)
  •  Jesse Hijinks (Animation) 
  • Daniel Kim (Audio) 
  • Robert Parker (Programming)
